column1: #text=Last weekend I booked a spur of the moment trip out to New York on a train .
#text=I bought my ticket for the train right at the station , I was lucky they had some left .
#text=After waiting about thirty minutes my train pulled up and came to a stop .
#text=I hopped on the train and found an open seat next to the window .
#text=After everyone was on the train slowly eased forward as it built up speed to New York .
#text=I enjoyed listening to the wheels of the train on the track as they clicked .
#text=The train ride was smooth and I was even able to get some rest along the way .
#text=As the train arrived in New York the conductor came over the loud speaker and let us know we would be at our destination shortly .
#text=Once the train slowed to a complete stop , me and all the other passengers filed out and went our separate ways .
